Cyber Arts Camp

Style

Transmission

Welcome back ! Today we are going to learn about S T Y L E. Everyone has it, but what is IT ?

Ascent Checklist

  • Clean workspace
  • Cut Triangles
  • Sharpie
  • Optional materials: Marking tools of all shapes, sizes, and colors (pens, markers, colored pencils, paint, etc), Scissors

Links

  • Jen Stark
  • Michael Velliquette
  • Bruce Gray
  • Camille Walala
  • Yayoi Kusama

Mission

  • Style Your Triangles - use the marker and other writing tools to style your soon to be dome home. Add your own unique take while thinking about your home planet.

  • Explore Art and Form - Use the above links to learn more about the artists and visionaries covered in today’s lesson.

  • What Style Means To You - Writing and thought exercise. Answer the following questions What is style ? What is an artist ? and what is art ? What do the artists you learned about today have in common ? Are there new ideas ?

  • Your Home Planet - Writing and thought exercise. Continue to elaborate on the narrative of your home planet as you design your dome home.
